item.title: Caressa add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The thing under my bed waiting to grab my ankle isn't real. I know that, and I also know that if I'm careful to keep my foot under the covers, it will never be able to grab my ankle." -- Stephen King

item.title: Caressa add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "I think that we're all mentally ill. Those of us outside the asylums only hide it a little better - and maybe not all that much better after all." -- Stephen King

item.title: Caressa add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "People say they "find" love, as if it were an object hidden by a rock. But love takes many forms and it is never the same for any man and woman. What people find then is a CERTAIN love." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Caressa add a quote by Rita Mae Brown
item.description: "I think the reward for conformity is that everyone likes you except yourself." -- Rita Mae Brown
